Specimen Type: Whole blood, plasma, serum, urine, cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), or tissue biopsy
Purpose: To detect CMV DNA in clinical specimens using a standardized PCR method.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood; sterile container for plasma, serum, urine, CSF, or tissue
Equipment: PCR machine (thermocycler), refrigerated centrifuge, vortex mixer
